Fields & Industries

Shoreline offers programs that cross all areas of study including Arts, Health, Technology, Business, and Social Sciences.

Advanced Technology

  • Automotive
  • Clean energy technology
  • Manufacturing

Business

  • Accounting
  • Business administration
  • Business technology
  • Purchasing and supply chain management

Education and Library Sciences

  • Education

Health and Wellness

  • Dental hygeine
  • Health information technology
  • Medical laboratory technology
  • Nursing

Humanities

  • Liberal arts transfer
  • Fine arts
  • Music
  • Music technology
  • Performance arts and digital filmmaking
  • Visual communications technology

Science, Math, and Engineering

  • Stem natural science transfer
  • Biotechnology
  • Stem engineering transfer

Social Sciences and Human Services

  • Criminal justice
  • Parenting
